data.comment: Delano Burgzorg puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 6, Great play from Giacomo Quagliata to set up the goal.
Almelo's Sinan Bakis has been booked in Heerenveen.
The first half has been concluded at Abe Lenstra Stadion.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Heerenveen.
Mats Knoester scores with a header and the away team increase their lead to 0-2.
Silvester Van der Water instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 54, Jan Paul van Hecke for Heerenveen has been booked by Martin Perez and receives a first yellow card.
Joey Veerman keeps the home team in the match by reducing the deficit to 1-2.
Rodney Kongolo with an assist there.
In the minute 58, Ulysses Llanez Jr. Is replacing Benjamin Nygren for the home team.
The home team have replaced Rodney Kongolo with Oliver Batista Meier. This is the first substitution made today by Johnny Jansen.
Mats Knoester (Almelo) has received a yellow card from Martin Perez.
In the minute 70, Frank Wormuth is making the team's first substitution at Abe Lenstra Stadion with Kasper Lunding replacing Silvester Van der Water.
The away team replace Delano Burgzorg with Luca de la Torre.
Ibrahim Dresevic is on a sub for Mitchell Van Bergen for Heerenveen.
In the minute 78, Almelo make their third substitution with Adrian Szoke replacing Sinan Bakis.
Heerenveen are down to 10 men after Pawel Bochniewicz has been shown a red card.
